mainVideoInfo.description:
Get the Mod: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2851429083
Get Binding of Isaac:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/250900/The_Binding_of_Isaac_Rebirth/
Get Repentance: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1426300/The_Binding_of_Isaac_Repentance/

Subscribe for more Binding of Isaac: http://bit.ly/SubscribeRetromation

Experience the modern classic, The Binding of Isaac, like you've never seen it before. It's a game too big to be called a sequel: Repentance takes Isaac to new heights of roguelike dungeon adventure, as the brave boy descends into the basement for his greatest challenge yet! Isaac's new quest takes him to unknown places he's never been, filled with horrible new enemies and bosses, weapon combos you've never synergized before and items he's never seen... unholy terrors from his wildest dreams and worst nightmares!

Support the channel on Patreon to gain a bunch of different rewards:
http://patreon.com/retromation

➡ Thank you to my supporters on https://www.patreon.com/retromation
➡ 3edgy5me863, Ashbinator, BigLow, Chrysophrase, 
Deadendsaint, Dysnomia, etheron369, Hephaestus, ihavehalfasoul, Junogray, JusticeTom, Kage_Shukuun, Little Hink, MoreThanAwesome, Nydeleric, Osoleve, Patrica, Piegood, ProjectLlama, Riffler Underhill, Rostepher, Romulus, Sainey, Sebastian Benn, Skoore, SpaceTime, Spence, StormXVI, The Turtle, and Throwbo! 

Join my Discord‼ → https://discord.gg/beAJPAP
Join the Wholesomeverse Discord‼ → https://discord.gg/v7gzKsa

BIGGER THAN A SEQUEL
The Binding of Isaac: Repentance is so huge, so new and so feature-packed that it makes previous updates look like prequels. There are more features, improvements and new secrets, too many secrets, than most games would include in an official sequel! It's an immense amount of new content to explore, even if you're at 1,000,000%!


THE "FINAL" UPDATE TO THE AWARD-WINNING CLASSIC
The Binding of Isaac: Repentance features hundreds of new features and quality-of-life improvements. It’s the ultimate edition of the genre-defining roguelike, now with OVER 500 HOURS of new gameplay!


KEY FEATURES:
- 130+ new items (more than 700 items in total)
- A full alternate path with brand new chapters and a new final boss and ending
- 100+ new enemies
- 25+ new bosses
- 2 new playable characters
- 5 new challenges
- 100+ new achievements
- 5,000+ new room designs

#BindingOfIsaac
